author: Andrew W. Lehren
title: Differing death tolls in California and Louisiana hint at the urgency to 'flatten the curve'
description: In California and Louisiana, two of the states hardest hit by the coronavirus, the difference of a handful of days is starting to show just how important social distancing has been to limiting the  spread of the pandemic.
content:
In California and Louisiana, two of the states hardest hit by the coronavirus, the difference of a handful of days is starting to show just how important social distancing has been to limiting the spread of the pandemic.
